# Yash Kapure

> Hire frontend developer for React and Next.js. 4+ years building production UIs and full-stack apps. Based in UK. Freelance for US, UK, and EU clients. $25–57/hour. Responds within 24–48 hours. 7 five-star testimonials. 80,000+ portfolio visits in 12 months.

## About

- [Home](https://www.yashkapure.com): Portfolio, skills, experience, 7 testimonials, and contact.

## Services

- React and Next.js development.
- Full-stack MERN/MEVN applications.
- TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js.
- Performance optimization and frontend architecture.
- SEO, AEO, GEO and production readiness.
- Google Business Profile setup (local search, Google Maps).
- Remote freelance and contract; $25–57 USD/hour.
